Selectboard

CURRENT BOARD MEMBERS

Zach Tirrell, Chair (term expires 2026)
Theodore Wisniewsk, Vice-Chair (term expires 2027)
Maryann Barnsley (term expires 2026)
Philip LaMoreaux (term expires 2028)
Jason Neenos (term expires 2028)

You can contact the Selectboard by emailing townhall@plymouthnh.gov. The email will be forwarded to all BOS members. The Select Board meets on the 2nd and 4th Monday of each month at 5:00 PM.

Please see the events calendar for more information.

**Select Board Committee Assignments**
Maryann Barnsley – Parks & Rec. Commission, Chamber of Commerce, Plymouth Regional High School (Alternate)
Philip LaMoreaux – Planning Board, Energy Commission, Union Negotiation Committee, Conservation Commission (Alternate)
Jason Neenos – Plymouth Village Water & Sewer Commission, Plymouth Elementary School (Alternate), Lakes Region Planning Commissioners (Alternate), Plymouth State University Negotiations, Police & Fire Building Assessment Committee 
Zach Tirrell – Planning Board (Alternate), Capital Improvement Committee (CIP), Advisory Budget Committee, Police & Fire Building Assessment Committee 
Theodore Wisniewski – Plymouth Elementary School, Plymouth Regional High School, Conservation Commission, Plymouth State University Negotiations, Union Negotiation Committee
